StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [AutoRollbackNWA]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS BEGIN
--Value from the PSR.dbo.Status table Declare @NWAStatusID as int = 5;
--Values from the PSR.dbo.Disposi.on table Declare @O.cerReappointID as int = 11; Declare @DQMoralID as int = 5; Declare @DQMedicalID as int = 6; Declare @DQProfessionalID as int = 7; Declare @DQOtherID as int = 8; Declare @DeceasedID as int = 9; Declare @PendingO.cerReappointID as int = 18;
Select L.LeadID into #RollbackNWA From Lead L inner join LeadStatusDisposi.on LSD on L.LeadID = LSD.LeadID inner join StatusDisposi.on SD on LSD.StatusDisposi.onID = SD.StatusDisposi.onID Where L.NWAApproved_Date < DATEADD(DAY, -91, GETDATE()) AND SD.StatusID = @NWAStatusID And SD.Disposi.onID NOT IN (@O.cerReappointID, @DQMoralID, @DQMedicalID, @DQProfessionalID, @DQOtherID, @DeceasedID, @PendingO.cerReappointID);
BEGIN TRANSACTION
UPDATE LSD SET StatusDisposi.onID = 9, DateUpdated = GETDATE() FROM LeadStatusDisposi.on LSD INNER JOIN #RollbackNWA on LSD.LeadID = #RollbackNWA.LeadID
-- Rollback the transac.on if there were any errors IF @@ERROR <> 0 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('Error occurred while performing the change.', 16, 1) RETURN END
COMMIT TRANSACTION
BEGIN TRANSACTION
UPDATE L SET L.NWARequested_Date = null, L.NWARequested_UserID = null, L.NWARequestTypeID = null, L.NWAApproved_Date = null, L.NWAApproved_UserID = null FROM Lead L INNER JOIN #RollbackNWA on L.LeadID = #RollbackNWA.LeadID
-- Rollback the transac.on if there were any errors IF @@ERROR <> 0 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('Error occurred while performing the change.', 16, 1) RETURN END
COMMIT TRANSACTION
BEGIN TRANSACTION
UPDATE AP Set AP.DateSubmited = null FROM ApplicantPackage AP INNER JOIN #RollbackNWA on AP.LeadID = #RollbackNWA.LeadID
-- Rollback the transac.on if there were any errors IF @@ERROR <> 0 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('Error occurred while performing the change.', 16, 1) RETURN END
COMMIT TRANSACTION
DROP TABLE #RollbackNWA;
END
